mapper.select: select t.id, t.code, t.content, t.data_id as "data.id", p.id as "property.id", p.code as "property.code", p.type as "property.type" from t_data_element t left join t_property p on t.property_id = p.id where t.data_id = #{dataId}
mapper.sql: select t.id, t.metadata_id as "metadata.id" from t_data t

update.foreach: update t_data_element set content = #{element.content} where id = #{element.id};
